sourcesContent:
import { Accordion, Container, Text } from "@mantine/core";

const PoliciesPage = () => {
  return (
    <Container size="xl">
      <Accordion variant="seperated">
        <Accordion.Item value="acceptance-of-terms">
          <Accordion.Control>1.Acceptance of Terms</Accordion.Control>
          <Accordion.Panel>
            By accessing or using this Website, you acknowledge that you have
            read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms, as well as
            our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated herein by reference. If
            you do not agree to these Terms or our Privacy Policy, you must not
            use this Website.
          </Accordion.Panel>
        </Accordion.Item>
        <Accordion.Item value="use-of-website">
          <Accordion.Control>2.Use of Website</Accordion.Control>
          <Accordion.Panel>
            You must be at least 18 years of age to use this Website. You agree
            that you will only use this Website for lawful purposes and in
            compliance with these Terms. You agree not to use this Website to:
            a. Harass, abuse, or harm another person or entity; b. Engage in
            fraudulent or deceptive activities; c. Violate any applicable laws
            or regulations; d. Infringe upon the intellectual property rights of
            others; e. Distribute viruses or other harmful computer code; f.
            Interfere with or disrupt the operation of this Website or the
            servers or networks used to make this Website available; or g.
            Engage in any other activity that we, in our sole discretion, deem
            to be inappropriate or that could harm our reputation.
          </Accordion.Panel>
        </Accordion.Item>
      </Accordion>
      <Text color="dimmed">Terms and Conditions were generated by ChatGPT</Text>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default PoliciesPage;
